Utility class that provides connection to the database. Singleton pattern.

Author:
FRMQ36 Revision history ------------------------------------------------------------ $Log: ConnectionPool.java,v $ Revision 1.8 2012/03/01 21:40:56 cmb004 issue #17556 Add a new exception type (FatalExeption) as well as some additional exception handling in the service launcher to deal with fatal vs. non-fatal errors. The main Service initialize method will now be able to throw an exception. Database Service will validate the connection pool handle during initialization and throw a FatalException if the connection pool won't connect.
